nodes.text: The Gundark gang was a criminal organization on the Nabooian moon Rori at the time of the Galactic Civil War. The gang was named after the gundark, one of the most fearsome species in the galaxy. They maintained a base near the city of Narmle.

Circa 1 ABY, the Aqualish criminal Ponda Baba lived on Rori. In order to replace the arm he lost on Tatooine, he hired some Gundark thug and committed a number of break-ins at cybernetic labs on Rori. However, the Aqualish was quickly identified by the Royal Naboo Security Forces. A spacer working for Lieutenant Tarc attacked the Gundark Base near Narmle and forced the Gundark gangsters to reveal the location of Ponda Baba's camp.
